SYSTEM: Ontologies-Methodology.pdf: Página 23
23
Ontology Requirements Specification. Task 1
 Input: a set of ontological needs 
 Objective: obtaining the purpose, scope and 
formality level of the ontology
 Techniques: physical or virtual interviewers
 Output: purpose, scope and level of formality of 
the ontology, which will be included in the 
corresponding slots of the OSRD template
speaker: SYSTEM
